textBox.richText: Max's first day in Park Sharks. Alli and I skiied together in the morning, hitting the trees under hi-lo, and heading over to vasquez. Hit a bunch of bumps after that...including one *spectacular* fall on cannonball. Unfortunately, didn’t catch it on film. Took a corner too fast, went airborn, landed, and slammed my heel on a rock. (I think it was one of the two “cannonballs” that are the namesake of the run. Got an evil bruise outta that one. That stinger stayed with me the whole season.
